addTransaction(uint256,address,address,b.details: Stores the data of a new transaction associated with the paying of the VAT of a single business owner in given quarter

params._addressee: The address of the payed user
params._addresser: The address of the paying user
params._amount: The amount in Cubit cents that was payed
params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year
params._refused: A boolean value that indicates if the transaction stands for the refusal of a payment

getCompensation(uint256,uint8,address).details: Returns the id of the compensation in a given quarter for a given business address

params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year

getDeduction(uint256,uint8,address).details: Returns the id of the deduction in a given quarter for a given business address

params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year

getVATCompensations(uint256,uint8,uint25.details: Returns all the vat compensations in a given period of time (for all users)

params._fromQuarter: The starting quarter (1-4) in the given year
params._fromYear: The year of the starting quarter
params._toQuarter: The ending quarter (1-4) in the given year
params._toYear: The year of the ending quarter

getVATDeductions(uint256,uint8,uint256,u.details: Returns all the vat deductions in a given period of time (for all users)

params._fromQuarter: The starting quarter (1-4) in the given year
params._fromYear: The year of the starting quarter
params._toQuarter: The ending quarter (1-4) in the given year
params._toYear: The year of the ending quarter

getVATTransactionData(uint256).details: Returns the data of a given transaction given the id

initialize(address,address).details: Initializes the contract saving the instances of the proxies of the contracts used by this contract

params._userManager: The instance of the proxy of the UserManager contract of this project
params._vat: The instance of the proxy of the VAT contract of this project
